    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>239</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using Apostrophes Correctly Quiz  </string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre la utilización correcta de los  apostrofes</string>
            <string language="ga">Uaschamóga a Úsáid i gCeart – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Apostrophen Befragen Sie Richtig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des Apostrophes Questionnez 
Correctement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando Apóstrofes Quiz Corretamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando Gli Apostrofi Quiz Correttamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τις αποστρόφους ρωτήστε σωστά</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Get the apostrophe right for once and for all!</string>
            <string language="es">¡Consigue que el apostrofe esté bien de una vez y para siempre!</string>
            <string language="ga">Faigh an uaschamóg i gceart anois agus i gcónaí!</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhalten Sie das Apostrophrecht für ein für 
allemal!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obtenez le juste d'apostrophe pour une fois pour 
toutes !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comece a direita da apóstrofe para uma vez e 
para tudo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenga la destra di apostrofo per una volta per 
tutte!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάρτε το δικαίωμα αποστρόφου για μια για πάντα!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
